#labels Phase-Requirements
==Functional Requirements==

  <b>1. Member Profiles</b>

       1.1. User profile shall contain name, surname, profile picture, email, password, phone number, entrance year for each user.


       1.2. The system shall send an email for confirmation after register.

       1.3. The system shall provide a password reminder via e-mail.
	
       1.4. The system shall provide an interface for editing profiles for users

       1.5. The system shall provide roles for the users (i.e. instructor, student, administrator) 

   <b>2. Creation of a space for special interests or topics</b>

       2.1. Users should be able to  create groups through their interests.
	 
       2.2. The creator of the group should be able to give role for group members
	
       2.3. Users should be able to invite other people to their own groups

       2.4. Users should be able to join groups

   <b>3. Special purpsose structures for the area of interes</b>
  
       3.1. Users should create an event with action date.

   <b>1.4 Discussion Forum</b>	
  
       4.1. Administrators should be able to open categories	
	
       4.2. Users should be able to open a topic on discussion forum in predefined categories

       4.3. Users should be able to write their own comments to the topics

       4.4. Users should be able to like or dislike any comments on any topics

   <b>5. Surveys</b>
 
       5.1 Users should be able to create surveys

       5.2. Users shall see the results of the survey after voting

       5.3. The creator of the survey shall give a due date for the surveys

   <b>6. Search/ Advanced Search</b>
 
       6.1. Users should be able to search for people, group, survey, topic on discussion forum

       6.2. The system shall give suggestions to users

       6.3. Users should be able to filter the results of the search

   <b>7. Browsing</b>
 
       7.1. Users should be allowed to navigate through user profiles,group,surveys

   <b>8. Notification from subscriptions</b>
 
       8.1. The system shall send notifications to users from subscribed pages.

       8.2. The system shall send a notification email.

   <b>9. Validation of a registration</b>
         
       9.1. The user shall be able to register the system by only approval of administrator
  
       9.2. The system shall provide a administration panel to aprove new users.

 
== Non-functional Requirements==

   <b>1. Usability</b>

      1.1. The system shall provide an simple interface to ease usage.
 
   <b>2. Accessibility</b>

      2.1. The community should be accessed only by people from CMPE people. 

      2.2. All users shall have the ability to access CMPE Community all the time, in every circumstances (i.e. non restricted number of profiles and usage time)
    
   <b>3. Privacy and Security</b>

      3.1. The user shall be able to hide his personal information from other users.

      3.2. The creator or the author of the group shall close the group for undesired people.

      3.3.  The creator of the survey shall open the survey only for people decided by himself.

      3.4.  The system shall keep password as a hashed password. 
  
   <b>4. Authentication</b>

      4.1. In the case of wrong password users shall be obliged to authenticate their information for security.
   
   <b>5. Portability</b>

      5.1 CMPE Community shall have a mobile application for portability. 

   <b>6. Avaliability</b>

      6.1. The user interface of the system shall be viewed properly by all internet browsers.  

   <b>7. Performance and Efficiency</b>

     7.1. Web pages of the application should be loaded quickly.

     7.2. The system shall minimize traffic amount between a server and a mobile device.
